changeSet.author: kcando
changeSet.sql:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.add_guild_vault') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.add_guild_vault GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.add_guild_vault @id TINYINT, @guild_id dbo.id_t AS SET NOCOUNT ON
INSERT INTO dbo.Guild_Vaults(id, guild_id) VALUES (@id, @guild_id)
SET NOCOUNT OFF
changeSet.rollback: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.add_guild_vault') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.add_guild_vault GO
